hero_subtitle: From stunning vacation homes to permanent residences, find your ideal property with breathtaking views.

why_curated_desc: Every property is carefully vetted and selected for its exceptional quality, location, and potential.
why_expert_desc: Our experienced team provides personalized service and market insights to guide your decisions.
why_trusted_desc: From search to closing, we ensure a smooth, transparent, and secure real estate experience.
testimonials_subtitle: We're proud to have helped so many find their dream homes.
testimonial_1_quote: "SunScapes made our dream of owning a home in Cabo a reality. Their team was professional, knowledgeable, and incredibly supportive throughout the entire process."
testimonial_2_quote: "The level of detail and care from the SunScapes agents was unmatched. We found the perfect investment property thanks to their expert guidance."
testimonial_3_quote: "As a foreign buyer, the process seemed daunting. SunScapes provided the clarity and confidence I needed. Highly recommended!"
footer_about_desc: Discover your perfect vacation home or permanent residence with stunning views and prime locations.
footer_newsletter_desc: Get exclusive access to new listings and market insights.
